records.where_clear: Aegean Sea, near Samos island, between Turkey and Greece, within the operational area of Joint Operation Poseidon 2020.
records.location_text_raw: Latitude Text Removed - Operational Area, Longitude Text Removed - Operational Area, Location details Text Removed - Operational Area, Reference to the operational area Yes, Joint operation Poseidon 2020, Planned port of disembarkation Samos island (GREECE), Departure country Turkey
records.context_note: A rubber boat with an estimated 25 people on board was in distress in the Aegean Sea. A SAR operation was launched, resulting in the recovery of one dead child, the rescue of 23 migrants, and the arrest of one facilitator and the father of the dead child.
records.evidence_quote: the corpse of a child was recovered by Text Removed - Technical Equipment from a rocky coastal area.
